articles.title: Top 10 highest earning footballers including Cristiano Ronaldo, Mesut Ozil and Paul Pogba - Mirror Online
articles.description: Mesut Ozil and Paul Pogba have had poor seasons so far for vastly different reasons, but both still hold a place in the list of highest-earning footballers
articles.content:
Mesut Ozil and Paul Pogba still have their places in the list of highest-paid footballers in the world.
Ozil, who has been frozen out by Mikel Arteta this season and seems unlikely to play again bef… [+3079 chars]

articles.author: Matt Addison
articles.title: Fabinho posing genuine Liverpool transfer question because of Virgil van Dijk and Thiago - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Fabinho has excelled since moving to centre-back for Jurgen Klopp and Liverpool in the absence of the injured Virgil van Dijk
articles.content:
Virgil van Dijk has been missing for 14 games since picking up his ACL injury against Everton in mid-October, but Liverpool have coped well without his world-class presence.
